main event: On September 6, 1967, Mr. Paul Miller and his wife observed a bright, disc-shaped craft that hovered silently over their home in Lowell, Michigan before accelerating rapidly and disappearing from view.
interesting points: The object was described as being about 50 feet in diameter and emitting a bright, steady light.
No sound was heard from the object.
Investigators from Project Blue Book were unable to determine the exact nature or origin of the observed object.
On September 24, 1967, a witness named Gerald Grappers reported seeing a round, metallic object about 50 feet in diameter hovering in the sky before suddenly accelerating and disappearing.
The rapid acceleration and disappearance of the object is consistent with other UFO reports.
sighted object: a bright, disc-shaped craft and a round, metallic object
witnesses: Mr. Paul Miller, his wife, and Gerald Grappers
